item.title: 中国批准摩根士丹利成立本地期货部门
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）已获得最终批准，将通过一个新成立的部门在中国开展期货业务，成为进入世界第二大经济体衍生品市场的第二个主要美国企业。【原文：Morgan Stanley has won final approval to launch a futures business in China via a newly established unit, becoming the second major U.S. entrant in the derivatives market of the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 新西兰央行描绘严峻经济前景
item.description: 新西兰中央银行周二描绘了一幅暗淡的经济图景，称失业率上升以及金融困难导致企业投资计划推迟。【原文：New Zealand's central bank painted a bleak economic picture on Tuesday, citing rising unemployment and delayed business investment plans due to financial hardships.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，派拉蒙主席 Shari Redstone 将在 Skydance 合并后离开董事会
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引熟悉她计划的人士的话报道，在派拉蒙全球公司完成与 Skydance Media 的合并计划后，莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）将不会继续留在该公司董事会。【原文：Shari Redstone won't stay on the board of Paramount Global after the company completes its planned merger with Skydance Media, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with her plans.】

item.title: 美国大选日将至，股市和美元岌岌可危
item.description: 股市横盘震荡，货币和债券市场平静无波，投资者在等待美国选出新的领导人，民意调查显示这场竞争岌岌可危。【原文：Stock markets moved sideways and an uneasy calm settled over currencies and bonds as investors waited for the United States to choose a new leader with polls showing the contest on a knife edge.】

item.title: 财新服务业采购经理人指数显示，中国服务业活动随着条件改善而回升
item.description: 周二进行的一项私营部门调查显示，10 月份中国服务业活动的扩张速度为三个月来最快，这主要得益于有初步迹象表明，中国政府大力推行的经济刺激政策正在帮助改善企业经营状况。【原文：China's services activity expanded at the fastest pace in three months in October, helped by early signs that Beijing's big stimulus push was helping improve business conditions, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普交易解除，美元受挫；澳元在澳大利亚央行会议前保持警惕
item.description: 美元周二一开始就处于守势，因为交易员们在美国总统大选当天平仓，此前最近的民意调查削弱了市场对共和党人唐纳德-特朗普获胜的部分押注。【原文：The dollar started Tuesday on the defensive as traders squared positions on the day of the U.S. presidential election, after recent polls dented some of the market bets on a victory for Republican Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美国大选和中国全国人大会议召开前油价下跌
item.description: 由于欧佩克+（OPEC+）推迟了12月份的增产计划并缓解了供应担忧，市场为美国总统大选带来的不确定性做好了准备，油价周二小幅回落。【原文：Oil prices eased slightly on Tuesday as markets braced for uncertainties from the U.S. presidential election, after rising more than 2% in the past session as OPEC+ delayed plans to hike production in December and eased supply concerns.】

item.title: 多米诺澳大利亚专营店长期任职的首席执行官下台，股价下跌
item.description: 多米诺比萨企业（Domino's Pizza Enterprises）是美国以外最大的比萨特许经营商，该企业周二表示，其长期首席执行官在执掌该企业二十多年后将卸任，在此期间，该企业已发展成为价值数十亿美元的企业。【原文：Domino's Pizza Enterprises , the franchise's biggest operator outside of the U.S., said Tuesday its longstanding CEO was stepping down after more than two decades at the helm during which the franchise grew into a multi-billion dollar business.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 正与加利福尼亚州洽谈成为营利性公司事宜
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周一援引两位知情人士的话报道称，山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）领导的 OpenAI 公司正在与加利福尼亚州总检察长办公室进行早期谈判，以改变公司结构，争取成为一家营利性企业。【原文：Sam Altman-led OpenAI is in early talks with the California attorney general's office to change its corporate structure in a bid to become a for-profit business, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 报告称，马斯克关于美国大选的错误言论将于 2024 年在 X 上获得 20 亿次浏览量
item.description: 据非营利组织 "反数字仇恨中心"（Center for Countering Digital Hate）的一份报告显示，亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）关于美国大选的虚假或误导性言论今年在社交媒体平台 X 上的浏览量达到了 20 亿次。【原文：False or misleading claims by billionaire Elon Musk about the U.S. election have amassed 2 billion views on social media platform X this year, according to a report by non-profit group Center for Countering Digital Hate.】

item.title: 韩国 10 月通胀为近四年来最弱，为更多降息创造条件
item.description: 周二的数据显示，韩国10月份的整体通胀率进一步放缓，创下近四年来的最弱水平，这加强了更多降息的理由，也加剧了人们对韩国央行2%目标未达标的担忧。【原文：South Korea's October headline inflation slowed further to the weakest level in almost four years, data showed on Tuesday, strengthening the case for more interest-rate cuts and fueling worries of an undershoot of the Bank of Korea's 2% target.】

item.title: Meta 将在美国大选后延长对新政治广告的禁令
item.description: Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms 周一在一篇博客文章中表示，将在美国大选后延长对新政治广告的禁令，并将暂停禁令维持到本周晚些时候。【原文：Meta Platforms will extend its ban on new political ads after the U.S. election, maintaining the suspension until later this week, the Facebook-parent said in a blog post on Monday.】

item.title: 拉斯维加斯业务疲软，永利第三季度利润和收入不及预期
item.description: 由于拉斯维加斯赌场业务低迷，永利度假村周一公布的季度利润和收入低于华尔街预期，导致其股价在延时交易中下跌 2.8%。【原文：Wynn Resorts posted quarterly profit and revenue below Wall Street expectations on Monday, due to sluggish casino business in Las Vegas, sending its shares down 2.8% in extended trading.】

item.title: 包括 Robinhood 和 Kraken 在内的加密货币公司推出全球稳定币网络
item.description: 由 Robinhood、Kraken 和 Galaxy Digital 等金融技术和加密货币公司组成的财团周一推出了一种与美元挂钩的联合稳定币。【原文：A consortium of financial technology and cryptocurrency companies including Robinhood , Kraken and Galaxy Digital on Monday introduced a joint stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 第三季度利润增长 18% 后，巴西 Itau Unibanco 上调信用展望
item.description: 巴西伊塔乌国民银行（Itau Unibanco）是拉丁美洲最大的私人贷款机构，在第三季度经常性净利润增长 18% 之后，周一上调了全年投资组合增长预期。【原文：Brazil's Itau Unibanco , Latin America's largest private lender, on Monday bumped up its estimated portfolio growth for the year after logging an 18% increase in its third-quarter net recurring profit.】

item.title: 亚洲 美国大选前的阴森平静，澳大利亚央行设定利率
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 承销和投资回报强劲，AIG 盈利超出预期
item.description: 美国国际集团周一公布的第三季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，原因是该保险公司受益于强劲的承保能力和较高的投资回报率。【原文：American International Group sailed past Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Monday as the insurer benefited from strong underwriting and higher returns on investments.】

item.title: Dollar Tree 首席执行官 Rick Dreiling 辞职
item.description: Dollar Tree 周一表示，Rick Dreiling 已辞去董事长兼首席执行官职务，11 月 3 日起生效。【原文：Dollar Tree said on Monday that Rick Dreiling has stepped down from his position as chairman and chief executive officer, effective Nov. 3.】

item.title: 人工智能应用蓬勃发展，Palantir再次上调2024年收入预期；股价大涨
item.description: Palantir Technologies 公司周一第三次上调了年度营收预期，押注于来自政府的强劲支出，以及希望采用生成式人工智能技术的企业对其软件服务不断增长的需求。【原文：Palantir Technologies on Monday raised its annual revenue forecast for the third time, betting on strong spending from governments and rising demand for its software services from businesses looking to adopt generative AI technology.】

item.title: Vertex Pharma 凭借囊性纤维化治疗的优势上调年度收入预期
item.description: Vertex 制药公司因囊性纤维化（CF）治疗需求旺盛，第三季度业绩超出预期，该公司周一上调了全年收入预期。【原文：Vertex Pharmaceuticals raised its annual revenue forecast on Monday after it beat third-quarter estimates on demand for its cystic fibrosis (CF) treatments.】

item.title: 美国银行鼓励员工投票，划出带薪休假时间
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）、美国银行（Bank of America）和花旗集团（Citigroup）提醒员工，他们可以利用带薪休假在周二的美国总统大选中投票，同时强调了跨政治派别工作的必要性。【原文：JPMorgan Chase , Bank of America and Citigroup reminded employees that they can take paid time off to vote in Tuesday's U.S. presidential election, while underscoring the need to work across political lines.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称银湖、贝恩准备竞购英特尔 Altera 部门数十亿美元的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司银湖（Silver Lake）和贝恩资本（Bain Capital）是可能竞相收购Altera少数股权的潜在收购方之一，英特尔在2015年以近170亿美元的价格收购了Altera的可编程芯片业务。【原文：Buyout firms Silver Lake and Bain Capital are among the potential suitors that are likely to compete to acquire a minority stake in Altera, the programmable chips business that Intel acquired for nearly $17 billion in 2015, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称毕马威将裁减不到4%的美国审计人员
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周一透露，毕马威会计师事务所将在美国裁员不到 4%，约 330 人。【原文：KPMG will lay off less than 4%, or about 330 people, of its audit workforce in the United States, a source familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 机器人人工智能初创公司 Physical Intelligence 从贝索斯和 OpenAI 那里融资 4 亿美元
item.description: 物理智能公司（Physical Intelligence）是一家为机器人开发基础软件的初创公司，该公司周一表示，它已从亚马逊的杰夫-贝索斯（Jeff Bezos）、OpenAI、风险投资公司 Thrive Capital 和 Lux Capital 那里筹集到 4 亿美元的早期资金。【原文：Physical Intelligence, a startup that is developing foundational software for robots, said on Monday it has raised $400 million in early-stage funding from Amazon's Jeff Bezos, OpenAI, venture capital firms Thrive Capital and Lux Capital.】

item.title: 加密世界美国大选投机者玩转预测市场
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普显然是击败卡马拉-哈里斯的热门人选--前提是你相信预测市场，这是不屈不挠的加密货币投机者的最新领域。【原文：Donald Trump is a clear favorite to beat Kamala Harris - that's if you put your faith in prediction markets, the latest frontier for the indefatigable crypto speculator.】

item.title: 美国大选为美联储会议蒙上阴影，债券投资者尽量减少押注
item.description: 在本周美联储政策会议召开之前，债券投资者在管理投资组合时保持着防御性的中性立场，而美国总统大选的悬而未决则让这次会议黯然失色。【原文：Bond investors are keeping a defensive but neutral stance in managing portfolios ahead of this week's Federal Reserve policy meeting, which is being eclipsed by the too-close-to-call U.S. presidential election.】

item.title: 英国立法者可能在明年初就工人权利问题向谢因提出质询
item.description: 据一个议会委员会的负责人称，英国立法者最早可能会在 1 月份就工人权利问题向在线快速时尚集团 Shein 的高管提问，因为该集团可能会在伦敦上市。【原文：British lawmakers could question executives of online fast-fashion group Shein on workers' rights as early as January, ahead of a possible London listing, according to the head of a parliamentary committee.】

item.title: 交易员平仓特朗普交易，美元下滑
item.description: 美元周一下滑，原因是投资者退出了因猜测共和党前总统唐纳德-特朗普更有可能在周二的总统大选中获胜而获益的头寸。【原文：The U.S. dollar slipped on Monday as investors exited from positions that have benefited from speculation Republican former President Donald Trump is more likely to win the presidential election on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟官员表示，中国电动汽车价格协议需要与关税一样有效
item.description: 欧盟未来可能的贸易负责人周一表示，与中国生产商就电动汽车最低价格达成的任何协议都必须与欧盟上周征收的关税一样有效和可执行。【原文：Any agreement reached with Chinese producers on minimum prices for electric vehicles would need to be as effective and enforceable as the EU tariffs that were imposed last week, the likely future European Union trade chief said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 9 月份工厂订单连续第二个月下降
item.description: 9 月份，美国制成品的新订单连续第二个月下降，企业的设备支出似乎在第三季度有所回落。【原文：New orders for U.S.-manufactured goods fell for a second straight month in September, and business spending on equipment appears to have pulled back in the third quarter.】
